name: Last Hope on Earth
storyline:
In a futuristic world where Earth is no longer humanity's peaceful home, clones are sent to the planet in order to make it habitable again. 
But make no mistake, nothing will be so easy as you, as a clone, will have to learn to deal with the hardships of limited resources, genetically modified animals from radiation, and an unstable and tense climate. 
You are Earth's Last Hope, but can you bring hope in a desolate world?
summary:
In Last Hope on Earth you will find several game mechanics in the style Open World Survival Craft and much more, such as: creation and construction of bases, search for items, collection of resources, PvP in open world, PvE against various monsters and animals, cooperation and a lot of fight for survival! 
 
What you can expect to find:  
- A gigantic world with maps up to 400km².  
- Diverse resources to be collected all over the map.  
- Constructions without limits, create your own fortress or city, gather players and create wars with other groups.  
- Weapons of the most varied types with various combinations.  
- Monsters of the most varied difficulties and animals trying to survive.  
- More than 8 different types of weather that vary dynamically.  
- Lots of action, survival and strategic shooting.
